text: (ebævin mevæni avasthāvanhi satya) viśvāsavantayin allāhgē mārgayehi (anivāryayenma) yuddha karannāha. pratikṣēpa karannan nam, (movunṭa viruddhava) ṣeyitāngē mārgayehima yuddha karannāha. ebævin ṣeyitāngē mituran samaga obat yuddha karanu. (ovungē pramāṇaya adhika vaśayen tibīma gæna sæka nositanu). niyata vaśayenma ṣeyitāngē kumantraṇaya itāmat khelahīnaya
